message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value for me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $10000 to you. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $9500, aiming to ensure a fair transaction that benefits both parties. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any other way I can assist you in making your decision.
